00001 /* Copyright (c) 2009 Hermann Kraus
00002  * This software is available under a "MIT Style" license
00003  * (see COPYING).
00004  */
00011 #include "srtm.h"
00012 #include "osm-parse.h"
00013 #include "relations.h"
00014 #include "settings.h"
00015 
00016 #include <curl/curl.h>
00017 #include <QDebug>
00018 #include <QLocale>
00019 
00021 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00022 {
00023     global_settings.parseSettings(argc, argv);
00024 
00025     OsmWayStorage *ways;
00026     OsmNodeStorage *nodes;
00027     if (global_settings.getDatasetSize() == size_small) {
00028         nodes = new OsmNodeStorageSmall();
00029         ways = new OsmWayStorageMem();
00030     } else if (global_settings.getDatasetSize() == size_medium) {
00031         nodes = new OsmNodeStorageMedium();
00032         ways = new OsmWayStorageDisk(".");
00033     } else {
00034         nodes = new OsmNodeStorageLarge();
00035         ways = new OsmWayStorageDisk(".");
00036     }
00037 
00038     curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_DEFAULT);
00039     /* Setting the locale should not be required but it can't harm.
00040      * QString::arg() is safe.
00041      * QString::toDouble first tries converting using the locale, then using the "C" locale.*/
00042     QLocale::setDefault(QLocale::C);
00043 
00044     //Download file lists first, so we can stop here if we notice an error
00045     SrtmDownloader downloader(global_settings.getSrtmServer(), global_settings.getCacheDir());
00046 
00047     QFile output(global_settings.getOutput());
00048     if (!output.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly)) {
00049         qCritical() << "Could not open output file" << global_settings.getOutput();
00050         exit(1);
00051     }
00052 
00053     OsmData data(ways, nodes);
00054     data.parse(global_settings.getInput());
00055 
00056     RelationWriter writer(&data, &output, &downloader);
00057     writer.writeRelations();
00058 
00059     output.close();
00060     delete nodes;
00061     delete ways;
00062     curl_global_cleanup();
00063 }
